q: Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., that would deny federal family-planning funds to any organization that performs abortions. Mike Pence makes clear that Planned Parenthood is his target; it would lose more than$ 70 million in annual funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, Mike Pence said. Bart Scott spoke for many when he talked about Ben Roethlisberger during conference championship week. "The respect we have for Ben Roethlisberger is that we don't look at him as a diva quarterback," said Bart Scott . We look at him as a football player. In this league, especially now, quarterbacks are treated pretty much like it's flag football. But he's one that's willing to take the hits and look down the barrel of a gun for his team. Tom Brady , Peyton Manning , Drew Brees , Michael Vick and Philip Rivers are all done for the season. Big Ben Roethlisberger is back in the Super Bowl. He's nothing like Aaron Rodgers . But he usually wins.

Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. "I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's "State of the Union" program today.
